hint: Apply early filtering on dimension tables before joining with facts, push predicates into CTE definitions, and materialize repeated CTEs to avoid recomputation across queries.

Pre-filter all dimension tables into separate CTEs before joining, extract shared dimension constraints (like market_id), and isolate date-like filters even though none exist—apply similarly to customer/customer_address.
Pre-join filtered dimensions with fact tables in CTEs, prefetch multiple dimension filters into a single CTE, and consolidate the two color queries into one pass with conditional aggregation.
Convert OR conditions (like birth_country <> country) into UNION ALL branches, transform HAVING subqueries to decorrelated joins, and re-express set operations as EXISTS patterns if they appear.
